nl.esciencecenter.esight.textures

Class RBOTexture

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.esight.textures.Texture
      • nl.esciencecenter.esight.textures.Texture2D
        • nl.esciencecenter.esight.textures.RBOTexture

  • public class RBOTexture
extends Texture2D
    Generic wrapper for a Texture for use as a RenderBuffer Object. Does not allocate memory for a ByteBuffer, since it is not needed.
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RBOTexture(int width, int height, int glMultiTexUnit)
      Default constructor, use this in combination with RenderBuffer.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void init(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl)
      Initialization method generic for all 2-D Textures.

      • Methods inherited from class nl.esciencecenter.esight.textures.Texture2D

        unBind, use

      • Methods inherited from class nl.esciencecenter.esight.textures.Texture

        delete, getDepth, getGLMultiTexUnit, getHeight, getMultitexNumber, getPixelBuffer, getPointer, getWidth, isInitialized, setDepth, setHeight, setInitialized, setPixelBuffer, setPointer, setWidth, toMultitexNumber

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • RBOTexture

        public RBOTexture(int width,
          int height,
          int glMultiTexUnit)
        Default constructor, use this in combination with RenderBuffer. Do not forget to call init(javax.media.opengl.GL3) before use.
        Parameters:
        glMultitexUnit - The OpenGL-internal MultitexUnit (GL.GL_TEXTUREX) this texture uses.
        width - The width of this texture. Generally the same size as the canvas width.
        height - The height of this texture. Generally the same size as the canvas height.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl)
        Description copied from class: Texture2D
        Initialization method generic for all 2-D Textures. Allocates space on the device and copies data from the pixelBuffer into it. Therefore, pixelBuffer cannot be null, or an error will be generated.
        Overrides:
        init in class Texture2D
        Parameters:
        gl - The current OpenGL instance.
